<!-- Code generated from the comments of the Play struct in provisioner/ansible-navigator/provisioner.go; DO NOT EDIT MANUALLY -->

- `name` (string) - Name of the play for logging and identification

- `target` (string) - Target can be either a playbook path (.yml/.yaml) or a role FQDN

- `extra_vars` (map[string]string) - Extra variables to pass to this play

- `tags` ([]string) - Tags to execute for this play

- `vars_files` ([]string) - Variables files to load for this play

- `become` (bool) - Whether to use privilege escalation (become) for this play

- `become_user` (string) - User to become when using privilege escalation

- `skip_tags` ([]string) - Tags to skip for this play
